Doll Diary: Kpop Dolly DIY

Brief:
Enter the imaginative realm of Doll Diary: Kpop Dolly DIY where creativity and fashion collide! Follow the journey of a shy transfer student as she navigates her new school life. Transform her into a fashion icon with your unique style choices, unlocking her potential to shine as a true Shy Star. Each outfit you create builds memories in her personal Doll Diary, making every moment unforgettable!

üìå Core Features:

  • Fashionista Experience: Choose from stunning outfits, shoes, and accessories perfect for any occasion! üëó
  • Custom Makeovers: Transform her look with customizable eye colors, hairstyles, and makeup options. üíÑ
  • Fashion Diary: Capture her stylish moments with photos and keep track of her fashion journey. üì∏
  • Endless Styles: Unlock various fashion themes ranging from cute and cozy to chic and fabulous! üåü
  • Creative Mix & Match: Experiment with over 1000+ fashion items, creating the perfect look for your doll. üéâ

üëç Pros:

  • Highly Creative: Encourages creativity with endless outfit combinations. ‚ú®
  • Kid-Friendly: Simple controls make it accessible for younger players. üß∏
  • Engaging Storyline: Captivating narrative that adds depth to the gameplay. üìñ
  • Fashion Trends: Keeps up with current styles promoting engagement in fashion culture. üë†

Doll Diary: Kpop Dolly DIY is available for free with optional in-app purchases to unlock additional content.

Join Doll Diary: Kpop Dolly DIY today and embark on a fashionable adventure where you help the New Girl shine in her new school, one outfit at a time!
